entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 07 January 2023
